It features, Aircon, Power Steering, Airbags, Aux, Bluetooth, Radio/CD, USB, Leather seats, Multifunction Steering, Electric Windows, Electric seat(driver), Electric Mirrors, Reverse Camera, Touch screen display, Navigation, Cruise Control, Heated Seats, Central Locking, Auto Lights, Keyless Entry, Park Sensors, Park Distance Control(PDC), Mags, LED Headlights, Side Steps, Roll Bar, Secure Lid and Tow Bar.

Nation Wide Delivery 15 years successful track record, trusted dealer with a selection of 50 cars under one roof. First payment in 60 days Everybody knows that Cars.Com2 rules MOTOR TOWN. Enquire now for friendly, professional, efficient and fast service. Its easy to do business with Cars.Com2.
